data.label: Description
data.detail: Provide single access point to Schneider's digital capabilities (user services) from various platforms under 1 logged-in experience. Primary feature available in Personalized Homepage Product is unifying customer profile and providing seamless access to business services/capabilities throughout a customer journey.

data.label: Environment
data.detail: Angular 8.x, Node.js, NPM, GraphQL, Svelte.js, JavaScript, Bootstrap, JSON, Visual Studio, Git, JIRA

detail.text: Involved in the program from the beginning to gathering, analyzing, documenting & maintaining system requirements and design documents.
Developed UI architecture, implemented front-end design and consuming persistence layer using GraphQL.
Developing reusable components for the application as UIaaS in Angular and Svelte.js.
Using Bootstrap & Media Queries to create Responsive Webpages across the different size of screen.
Performing UI Unit testing using frameworks Karma/Jasmine.
Developing project using VS code editor, version control with Git and automated build & deployments using AWS Amplify, Lambda.
Sincerely involved in Code Review and documentations.
Involved in the Performance Tuning of the Application on client side.
Facilitating daily SCRUM meetings, sprint planning, sprint review, and sprint retrospective.

data.label: Client

data.label: Description
data.detail: The goal of the developing this web application product is to create a AI driven interview platform for technical hiring with finest viewing and interactive experience to hire a best applicant. This product includes scheduling interview, conducting live video interview, chatting, resume sorting, interview questions panel, code editor, rating interviewee, and screen sharing.

data.label: Description
data.detail: The goal of the Digital Experience application is to create an airline solution for the user with optimal viewing and interactive experience. This includes shop and book, change Itinerary, manage trip options and cancel modules. All the components in the application interact with the Digital connect layer which has the JSON services. The development includes mobile, tablet/iPad and different browsers to make sure the application is responsive and interactive.
